data.text: @USPS @USPS @USPSHelp will I be able to make 2 orders since I never received my first one even though I signed up on the 1st day the website was up and running.
@tr_wexler @USPS Took 30 days to get ours. Now they want us to order more??? Truly laughable. No plans to use the ones we got, just wanted to see if we would get them and how long it would take.

@USPS @Rosa_DeLauro I want a Covid-19 test made in America, not China.
Are you aware that Russia has invaded Ukraine,? The world has changed for the worst Biden is telling us that the high gas prices are Putin's Fault. Why doesn't Biden take responsibility for his bad policy? Open up our  Energy.

@USPS Hey if you’d add my new address that was submitted January 10 I’d absolutely order those tests. Hard to order when your own website says not a valid address. Still waiting on that COA to be validated #FireDeJoy
@USPS USPS is trash. Wrecked my yard with their incompetent drivers. https://t.co/OoYWehKYyp
@USPS USPS SUCK! YOU GUYS CANT EVEN TRACK YOUR DELIVERY TRUCKS!
@tr_wexler Hello, I’m sorry you’re having trouble. Please follow us and direct message the tracking number so that I can assist you. ^JN
@USPS Did anybody else never receive their first batch?  I got the initial confirmation email in January right after ordering, but never got a shipment confirmation (nor, of course, the tests.)
@USPS Will the new funding prevent stealing gift cards from mailing in fountain Hills AZ post office?
